page.title: 11CLUBS
page.content: THERE ARE MANY CLUBS IN NORTHFIELD.THE CLUBS FOR YOUNGSTERS ARE AT NORTHFIELD SCHOOL,ALLEN'S CROSS,THE YMCA AND TRESCOTT SCHOOL.THE CLUBS FOR ADULTS ARE THE GOLF CLUB,NEVILLE'S CROSS,AND ALLEN'S CROSS COMMUNITY HALL.THE PAST- ORAL CENTRE AND THE BRITISH LEGION ARE FOR BOTH. IN THE YOUTH CLUBS THEY HAVE SPONSORED WALKS AND SWIMS TO RAISE MON EY FOR CHARITIES.ALSO THEY PLAY DARTS, POOL,TABLE TENNIS,VIDEO GAMES,MURDER BALL,FOOTBALL,HOCKEY,BADMINTON,TRAMP- OLINING,ICE SKATING AND MUCH MORE. DISCOS ARE ALSO HELD.IT IS NOT VERY DEAR TO GET IN .THEY ALSO ORGANISE DAY TRIPS TO DIFFERENT PLACES.AT SCOUTS THEY HAVE SIMILAR GAMES AND GO TO VENT URE CAMPS.ADULTS PLAY BINGO,DARTS,DOM- INOES AND SNOOKER.AT THE COMMUNITY CEN TRE PLAYS,DANCES,AND SHOWS TAKE PLACE.
